user.title: Add WiiM Speaker
user.description: Set up your WiiM or LinkPlay-compatible speaker.

data_description.host: Enter the IP address of your WiiM speaker (e.g., 192.168.1.100)

upnp.title: Select WiiM Speaker
upnp.description: Choose a speaker from the discovered devices, or configure manually.

confirm.title: Confirm Setup
confirm.description: Confirm adding this WiiM speaker to Home Assistant.

abort.cannot_connect: Unable to connect to the speaker.

error.cannot_connect: Failed to connect to the speaker. Check the IP address and network connection.
error.unknown: Unexpected error occurred. Please try again.
error.no_host: Could not determine speaker IP address.

init.title: Configure Speaker Settings
init.description: Adjust settings for this WiiM speaker. Changes apply immediately without restart.

data_description.status_update_interval: How often to check speaker status (1-60 seconds). Lower values provide faster updates but use more resources.
data_description.volume_step_percent: Volume change amount when using volume up/down buttons (1-50%). Smaller steps provide finer control.
data_description.enable_group_entity: Create a dedicated group control entity for this speaker. This entity provides advanced multiroom functionality including group-aware volume control, playback command forwarding for slaves, and unified group management. The '[Device Name] Master' entity allows complete control regardless of the speaker's current role (solo, master, or slave).
data_description.debug_logging: Enable detailed logging for troubleshooting. Recommended only when experiencing issues.

play_preset.name: Play Preset
play_preset.description: Play a preset station or playlist (buttons 1-6 on speaker).

sync_time.name: Sync Time
sync_time.description: Synchronize speaker clock with Home Assistant time.
